name: Dexterity (itch) (FunFish)
description:
Complicated? Try again! because there is no saving in this game. Can you make it to the end in one playthrough? You have to carefully calculate each of your clicks, so as not to stumble and not to lose. There are a total of 5 levels in this game, 1 of which is a boss! each level includes 2 conditions. 1 - Unlock the wall, 2 - Get to the finish line. Your main task, do not crash, and do not get shot by the boss! The game will definitely make you sweat!

Changes in 1.0.1:

1. The main menu has been changed

2. Bug fixes
